data.title: mysite
data.text:
IATLA welcomes all former students of Master Moy Lin-Shin to join. Together we can achieve a better understanding of his teachings. It is the Mission of all Members of IATLA to:

Raise public awareness of the benefits of Tai Chi and LokHup Bafa

Train volunteer instructors to teach Tai Chi, focusing on seniors to help alleviate their suffering

Provide technical, financial and moral support to former students of Master Moy so that they can once again help others by teaching Tai Chi and LokHup Bafa

The last statement is especially important, since an increase in the number of teachers will increase the number of people benefiting from Tai Chi. This way we can move toward realizing Master Moy’s vision more effectively.

​
